column1: The Pit Room////I'd say it was just ok. My kids and I had the chopped beef sandwich. The chopped beef was a bit over cooked (crunchy). I heard about this place and decided to give it a try against my better judgement of going to Killen's in Pearland
column2: but it'll probably my last. If I do go back
column3: it'll be to try to the brisket. If disappointed then
